name: guard-split
effect: Averages the user’s unmodified Defense with the target’s unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.
short_effect: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.
flavor_text: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of its target’s.
